TopicTitle: [1.7.2] ATK Propulsion Pack - "SRB's for all your SRBy needs" - Updated 14/06/19

Articles.Content:
![y02J3WM.png](https://i.imgur.com/y02J3WM.png)

This mod adds various solid rocket motors of Orbital ATK (Thiokol) to the game with a low memory footprint.

**Real Solar System / Realism Overhaul is supported**, thanks to [@raidernick](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/97711-raidernick/) for making the configs. To use with <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>, simply download <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>, install this mod, and let <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> patch all these parts to its real numbers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**Contents**

- Star 3
- Star 4G
- Star 5C
- Star 6B
- Star 9
- Star 13B
- Star 15G
- Star 17A
- Star 20
- Star 27
- Star 27H
- Star 30BP
- Star 31
- Star 37FM
- Star 48B
- Star 63
- Castor 4A
- Castor 30A
- GEM-40 (GL & AL)
- GEM-46 (GL & AL)
- GEM-60
- GEM-63 & GEM-63XL

**Pictures:** [https://imgur.com/a/BhlKt](https://imgur.com/a/BhlKt)

**Download:**[SpaceDock](http://spacedock.info/mod/404/ATK%20Propulsion%20Pack)

**Changelog**

*Version 4 - 14th June 2019*

- Support for KSP 1.7.2
- New GEM-40 model & textures (Air- & Ground-lit)
- Added GEM-60, GEM-63, GEM-63 XL
- New model for the Star 48B and Star 48BV
- General rebalancing of the parts

*Version 3.9 - 14th June 2019*

- Support for KSP 1.6.1

*Version 3 - 13th March 2016*

- Redone colliders
- Uploaded to SpaceDock

*Version 2*

*Version 1.1b - 28th August 2015*

*Version 1.1 - 9th July 2015*

*Version 1 - 7th August 2015*

**License**

All rights reserved. Rights for the booster name &  concepts of course belong to Orbital ATK.

Upon request (by PM), I allow other users to include some of these motors in their own mods, but they need to name me as the original author of these parts.

Hooray for more of Kartoffelkuchen's mods!
Ooh the possibilities! Can't wait to try these out.
Yess I need one of these
They are cool looking, I really like the spherical ones ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
yasss, perfect for my probes. any plans for GEM series or Castor series motors?
Awesome! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks guys for the amazing feedback! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> yasss, perfect for my probes. any plans for GEM series or Castor series motors?

Yes, Castor and GEM series are planned too. The parts belonging to ATK from Launchers Pack will be moved in this mod too, and since I already have all GEM motors (GEM-40, GEM-46, GEM-60) for the Delta II and Delta IV, the GEM series is already done! They are currently not included, since I am still working on the balancing, so that they work good with the Launchers Pack rockets. 

Generally, I am going to make the different series of ATK (maybe not each variant of every series ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)), but I am planning to do the most important things. And more if I want to . ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) This is a long time project, and I hope I can update regulary.

If you have any wishes regarding a motor you would like to have in this pack, feel free to post and I will make the motor(s) you want (If I can)! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Jeez you're quick with pumping out part mods! I just finished the Star 27 and 37FM motors for personal use, and I was going to make all of the kicker motors. Now I can just download and use your ones ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Gracias!

@Kartoffelkuchen: actually [OtherBarry](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/103778-OtherBarry) messaged me said they could make them by this weekend. I hadn't started on them yet so it was fine by me ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Why not include little packs like this into SELV or something? All of these little packs like this and the other new engine mod you have confuses me.

> 
> Why not include little packs like this into SELV or something? All of these little packs like this and the other new engine mod you have confuses me.

Well, this is actually something which is 100% based on their real world counterparts, with exact sizes etc. SELV is "based" on real world stuff, but with the "KSP-flare" included, meaning that the sizes are adapted for KSP, and that they look not 100% like the real parts. So SELV and ATK won't be combinated there. 

As far as the LV-T continued mod is concerned, well, I agree, it was probably not very well-thought of me. I will let that thread be closed, it is just unnecessary, it fits perfectly into SELV. I just came up with the idea of having something like that, but I did not thought it to the end there...
Tiny update, changed stats of Star 37FM and Star 48B for the Launchers pack update. REMOVE ANY OLD VERSIONS BEFORE INSTALLING THE NEW ONE!

I installed the latest version of RO from github, but I unfortunately didn't get RO compatibility. I looked in the RO folder and didn't find a .cfg file for this mod. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
A new RO has not yet been released. You'll need to download RO from source, i.e. go to the repo page and click "Download Repository"
Can I make a request for a Star 4B? It was a pretty powerful star for the early '60s. They used it in a double stack for one of the early Atlas's for orbital insertion motors
